description.raw:
- Re-enabled setting model and link properties

- Added tests for ModelListWidget

There are still remaining issues:
- setting names doesn't work properly so they are disabled
- disabled setting collision and visual properties as there are no tests yet to verify they work or not

Need to check ABI compatibility. Touched `link.proto` file and added a function in `Event.hh` which may cause incompatibility
